content.rendered:
Directed by Mani Ratnam.

Written by Mani Ratnam.

Cast Arvind Swami(Varadharajan ‘Varadhan’ Senapathi). Arun Vijay(Thyagarajan ‘Thyagu’ Senapathi). Silambarasan Rajendar(Ethirajan ‘Ethi’ Senapathi (as T.R. Silambarasan)). Vijay Sethupathi(Inspector Rasool Ibrahim). B. Thyagarajan(Chinnappadasan). Prakash Raj(Senapathi). Jayasudha(Lakshmi Senapathi). Jyotika(Chitra Varadarajan (as Jyothika)). Aishwarya Rajesh(Renuka Thyagarajan). Dayana Erappa(Chaaya Ethirajan). Aditi Rao Hydari(Parvathi). Mansoor Ali Khan(Khalid). Sarath Kumar(Chinnappadasan’s son-in-law). Rj Sindhu(Senapathi’s daughter). Santhosh(Senapathi’s son-in-law). Siva Ananth(Chezhiyan). Gowtham Sundararajan(Assistant Commissioner). T.M. Karthik Srinivasan(Ranjith (as T.M. Karthik)). Sugunthan(Veluthambi). George Vijay Nelson(Esthappa). Richard Anthony(Abu). Vignesh Raghavan(Ravi). G. Vittal Rao(A. H. Basheer). Kavitha Bharathy(Aruldas). Divyasree(Bhuvana). Kumar Natarajan(Chinnappa and Senapathi’s lawyer) . Isky Fay(Thai assassin).Cheenu Mohan

Language Tamil.

Producers Siva Ananth. K. Chinnadurai. Alek Conic. K. Chinna Durai. Kiran. Bejoy Nambiar. Nish Niruthan. Mini Purushot. Mani Ratnam. A. Subaskaran.

Production Lyca Productions. Madras Talkies.
